Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A guy who eats people tries to solve murders with help of detective lady.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Spiderman: Into the Spiderverse
Description: An animated adaptation of the Spiderman involving different versions of himself from alternate realities.

Genre.Name: Animation
Genre.Description: Method of manipulating figures to appear as if in motion.

Director.Name: Peter Ramsey
Director.Bio: American film director, illustrator, and writer.

Title: Iron Man
Description: A billionaire weapons maker is kidnapped and has to force his way out of imprisonment by designing a super suit that leads him to becoming a superhero in his own way.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Science fiction uses fictional-based displays of phenomena not fully accepted by mainsteam scientists.

Director.Name: Jon Favreau
Director.Bio: American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Iron Man 2
Description: Tony Stark is back again as the hero Iron Man. He feels the pressure to share his technology with the government and other agencies, but will the pressure get to him, or will he be able to fight back

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: Science fiction uses fictional-based displays of phenomena not fully accepted by mainsteam scientists.

Title: Iron Man 3
Description: Plagued with worry and insomnia since saving New York from destruction, Tony Stark (Robert Downey Jr.), now, is more dependent on the suits that give him his Iron Man persona -- so much so that every aspect of his life is affected, including his relationship with Pepper (Gwyneth Paltrow).

Genre.Name: Science Fiction

Director.Bio: American filmmaker and actor who has written such films as Lethal Weapon and Lethal Weapon 2.

Title: Captain America: Civil War
Description: Political pressure mounts to install a system of accountability when the actions of the Avengers lead to collateral damage. The new status quo deeply divides members of the team.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action films generally involve violence, fighting, and physical activities.

Director.Name: Joe Russo
Director.Bio: American producer, writer, and he co-directs with his brother.

Title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Description: After the cataclysmic events in New York with his fellow Avengers, Steve Rogers, aka Captain America (Chris Evans), lives in the capital as he tries to adjust to modern times. An attack throws him into a web of intrigue that places the whole world in danger.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action films generally involve violence, fighting, and physical activities.

Director.Name: Joe Russo

Title: The Avengers
Description: When Loki, the God of Mischief, gains unlimited power, the superheroes must join forces to stop him from taking over the planet.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action films generally involve violence, fighting, and physical activities.

Director.Name: Joss Whedon
Director.Bio: American producer, director, screenwriter, comic book writer, and composer.

Title: The Avengers: Age of Ultron
Description: When Tony Stark fears another invasion from alien forces, he creates Ultron, the ultimate AI defense system. Unfortunately, Ultron becomes insistent on the eradication of all human life in order to protect the planet. The Avengers must once again join forces to stop the greatest threat against all humanity.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action films generally involve violence, fighting, and physical activities.

Director.Name: Joss Whedon
Director.Bio: American producer, director, screenwriter, comic book writer, and composer.

Title: The Avengers: Infinity War
Description: Thanos is a supreme being in search of the Infinity Stones. Once he collects them, he plans erasing half of the population of the universe. Will the Avengers be able to stop him, or will half of all life cease to exist?

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action films generally involve violence, fighting, and physical activities.
